title: Familiar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Assist a coven member in the day.
-With the Necronomicon, deal a basic attack at your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The coven member will have their necronomicon effect for the night.
-You may not assist 2 days in a row.
-When you kill someone, you will devour them until only a skeleton Is left, obscuring their role and last will.

desc:
Post 295
*A familiar perched on its partners shoulder is said to greatly empower them.*
